verbs.description: < p > President Donald Trump [V: is] delivering a statement from the Group of Seven summit in Quebec , saying he had a successful set of meetings in which he discussed the need for " fair and reciprocal " trade and ways of addressing the threat of Iran.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: delivering] [ARG1: a statement from the Group of Seven summit in Quebec] , [ARGM-ADV: saying he had a successful set of meetings in which he discussed the need for " fair and reciprocal " trade and ways of addressing the threat of Iran.</p] >

< p > President Donald Trump is delivering a statement from the Group of Seven summit in Quebec , saying [ARG0: he] [V: had] [ARG1: a successful set of meetings in which he discussed the need for " fair and reciprocal " trade and ways of addressing the threat of Iran.</p] >

< p > President Donald Trump is delivering a statement from the Group of Seven summit in Quebec , saying he had [ARGM-LOC: a successful set of meetings] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: he] [V: discussed] [ARG1: the need for " fair and reciprocal " trade and ways of addressing the threat of Iran.</p] >

< p > President Donald Trump is delivering a statement from the Group of Seven summit in Quebec , saying he had a successful set of meetings in which he discussed the need for " fair and reciprocal " trade and ways of [V: addressing] [ARG1: the threat of Iran.</p] >
